m_szDocSumamry: The Myth Of U.S. Carbon Dioxide Emissions Reductions December 7th, 2012 by Zachary Shahan     This is an excellent, insightful piece by Kevin Matthews, Editor-in-Chief of  Architecture Week  (reposted from Climate Progress ). Though, heads up, it’s also a bit depressing (especially for those of us who were quite happy to see news of the US CO2 emissions drop mentioned below). Not much to preface it with, just read on…. by Kevin Matthews A person — a public figure, member of the media, maybe even an international climate negotiator — could be confused about U.S. carbon dioxide emissions.
